actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Comptroller General of the United States to prescribe the monetary limitation for waiver of claim actions by the heads of agencies and Secretaries of Executive departments.

summary.text: Changes the monetary limitation for the waiver of actions brought by the heads of Federal agencies on claims arising out of the overpayment of pay and allowances from $500 to an amount to be set from time to time by the Comptroller General.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Comptroller General of the United States to prescribe the monetary limitation for waiver of claim actions by the heads of agencies and Secretaries of Executive departments.
